channel.title: Cookie Thread v3.0 - Random poster before post 5000 gets a cookie
channel.description:

Look at it Don't you want that cookie?

Firekitten - Post 4000 5. Boss110 - Post 5000 6. MaximusPrime - Post 10000 7. Hjasik - Post 11111 8. Hjasik - Post 12345 9. Alice - Post 13371 10. Datbird - Post 15000 11. WazzaAzza - Post 16969 12. Chloe - Post 40000 21. Stolen by the void - Post 42069 22. Chloe - Post 44444 23. Marshal - Post 45678 24. Emelia - Post 50000

item.description:
btw gamers hereâ€™s a PSA

Most of us are talking on the server in @Simonâ€™s profile. Itâ€™s unofficial but it has a lot of channels (consider them like threads) and we do cool things in there

Itâ€™s kind of the de-facto off-topic and is very personalized for FoL people and FoL peopleâ€™s needs

We have gay rights and fredboat and wolfia

This isnâ€™t trying to say like that you shouldnâ€™t go on official server or anything, itâ€™s just where a lot of us are hanging out in the absence of off-topic and weâ€™d love to see yâ€™all there

I have an inv link below too but if itâ€™s expired just click the one in amiâ€™s profile

Discord is the easiest way to communicate over voice, video, and text. Chat, hang out, and stay close with your friends and communities.
